item.title: Hugo Tag Could
item.description: I recently started to look at migrating this blog from WordPress to a static site engine. Hugo got my attention and I decided to try it out. One thing I have in WordPress is a tag cloud. I couldn’t find an example of how to create one with varying font sizes in Hugo, so I tried creating my own. Hugo discussion forum topics Weighted tag cloud and Tag Cloud talk about this.
